nested.name: jsx3.gui.NumberInput
nested.text: A form element (text box) that stores a number value.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Column
nested.text: Provides a way to generate a column of data for a jsx3.gui.List instance (or compatible subclass).

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Interactive
nested.text: Mixin interface.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.ImageButton
nested.text: An object-oriented interface onto a GUI button made of various image files.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Grid
nested.text: The jsx3.gui.Grid class is a subclass of the jsx3.gui.List class.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Matrix
nested.text: The Matrix control is the standard visual interface for the Common Data Format (CDF), providing grid and tree-grid functionality that mirrors the the record and attribute structures used by the CDF.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Tab
nested.text: Renders a tab in a tabbed pane.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Form
nested.text: Mixin interface.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Select
nested.text: The JSX version of a standard GUI select box.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.TextBox
nested.text: This jsx3.gui.TextBox class allows integration of a standard HTML text input into the JSX DOM.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.List
nested.text: The jsx3.gui.List class supports sorting, resizing, reordering, selection, discontinuous selection, key and mouse navigation, etc.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Painted
nested.text: Abstract superclass of model objects that are painted to screen.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.RadioButton
nested.text: A GUI control that implements a single radio button.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.LayoutGrid
nested.text: This class provides a way to organize a set of GUI objects in a grid.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Slider
nested.text: A GUI control that implements a draggable slider.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Splitter
nested.text: This class manages layouts by providing a container that will paint its first two child GUI objects separated by a 'splitter' (either vertical or horizontal).

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Tree
nested.text: Creates a DHTML-based navigational trees (similar to the tree structure used by Windows Explorer with folders and files).

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Image
nested.text: Renders an image.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Heavyweight
nested.text: GUI utility class that provides a way to display HTML content on-screen in an HTML equivalent of a heavyweight container.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.ToolbarButton
nested.text: Renders a toolbar button.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Stack
nested.text: This class is equivalent to a tab, but uses the stack metaphor; like a tab, it has one childâ€”a block for its content; a jsx3.gui.Stack instance should only be contained by a jsx3.gui.StackGroup instance for proper rendering.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.HotKey
nested.text: Encapsulates a keydown event listener that is invoked by a certain combination of keys pressed simultaneously.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.DatePicker
nested.text: A form element that allows for the selection of an arbitrary date by showing a navigable calendar.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.IFrame
nested.text: Renders an IFrame.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.ColorPicker
nested.text: A GUI class that allows the user to pick a color using an HSB (hue-saturation-brightness) picker.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Event
nested.text: Native browser event wrapper.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.CDF
nested.text: Provides a container that maps to a CDF Document in the cache.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.StackGroup
nested.text: similar to how a tabbed pane manages a collection of tabs, the stack group is a parent container that manages JSXStack instances

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Block
nested.text: This class provides a container-based, object-oriented approach to creating static html objects (basically this class creates "DIV" objects).

nested.name: jsx3.gui.TimePicker
nested.text: A form element that allows for the selection of an arbitrary time of day.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Sound
nested.text: Class that provides an object-oriented interface for playing sounds in a GI application.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Window
nested.text: Allows for rendering a branch of the DOM of an application in a separate browser window.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Button
nested.text: Provides a object-oriented interface for a standard command button.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Dialog
nested.text: Renders a dialog window.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.CheckBox
nested.text: This class is a wrapper of the standard HTML checkbox.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Template
nested.text: Provides template related services to the base template class, jsx3.gui.Template.Block.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Menu
nested.text: Create GUI menus, similar in functionality to system menus (File, Edit, etc) created by the host OS.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Table
nested.text: A lightweight control that displays CDF data in an HTML table.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.WindowBar
nested.text: jsx3.gui.WindowBar instances are used as the captionbar for JSXDialog and JSXAlert instances.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.TabbedPane
nested.text: Renders a tabbed pane, which consists of a set of tabs, only one of which is visible at a time.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.BlockX
nested.text: Paints the result of an XSL transformation in an Block.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.DojoWidget
nested.text: An adapter for Dojo widgets.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Alerts
nested.text: Mixin interface allows implementors to show alerts, confirms, and prompts.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Matrix.BlockMask
nested.text: The interface that defines the methods that affect the behavior of a composite object used as an edit mask of a matrix column.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Template.Block
nested.text: Provides base class for creating custom GUI classes.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Matrix.EditMask
nested.text: The interface defining the methods that affect the behavior of an object used as an edit mask in a matrix column.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Matrix.ColumnFormat
nested.text: A class that defines the methods required for an object to be used by jsx3.gui.Matrix.Column instances to format cells of data.

nested.name: jsx3.gui.Matrix.Column
nested.text: Column control for use as a child of a jsx3.gui.Matrix class
